TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit AuthenticatingEventArgs extends System.EventArgs

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要自定义在运行时对用户凭据进行身份验证的方式, 则可以为事件创建处理程序。You create a handler for the event when you want to customize how the user's credentials are authenticated at run time. 类将值提供给任何事件处理程序。 The class supplies values to any event handler. 通过使用此类中提供的属性, 你可以检索用户凭据以自定义身份验证。By using the properties available in this class, you can retrieve the user credentials to customize authentication. 类在验证用户凭据前引发事件。 The class raises the event before validating the user credentials. 类构造对象的实例并将其传递给任何事件处理程序。 The class constructs an instance of the object and passes it to any event handler. 您可以使用、 和属性来检索用户凭据。You can use the , and properties to retrieve the user credentials. 属性可以包含身份验证所需的其他值, 如标识号。The property can contain additional values that are required for authentication, such as an identification number. 属性指示用户凭据是否有效。The property indicates whether the user credentials are valid. 将属性设置为自定义身份验证的结果。You set the property to the result of your customized authentication. 此外, 如果已检查用户凭据 , `true`并且不希望类通过默认的成员资格提供程序检查用户凭据, 则将属性设置为。In addition, you set the property to `true` if you have checked the user credentials and do not want the class to check user credentials through the default membership provider. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个事件处理程序, 该处理程序将和值传递到自定义成员资格提供程序来验证用户凭据。The following example shows an event handler that passes the and values to a custom membership provider to validate the user credentials. 事件处理程序将设置为方法的返回值, 并将设置`true`为, 以使类不验证凭据。The event handler sets to the return value of the method and sets to `true` so that the class does not validate the credentials. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/vb/Global.asax#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户凭据是否有效。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user credentials are valid.

value.span: 如果用户凭据有效，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user credentials are valid; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在事件的事件处理程序中对用户凭据进行身份验证, 请设置属性以指示用户凭据是否有效。If you authenticate user credentials in an event handler for the event, set the property to indicate whether the user credentials are valid. 如果用户凭据有效并且不需要其他验证, 则将设置为`true`和 `true`。If the user credentials are valid and no additional validation is needed, set to `true` and to `true`. 设置属性以指示身份验证服务应跳过用于对用户进行身份验证的默认步骤。You set the property to indicate that the authentication service should bypass the default steps for authenticating a user. 仅当 设置为`true`时, 类才使用中的值。 The value in is used by the class only if is set to `true`. 如果为`false`, 则类将调用默认的成员资格提供程序来验证用户凭据, 然后覆盖中的值。If is `false`, the class calls the default membership provider to validate user credentials, and then overwrites the value in . ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个事件处理程序 , 它将和值传递到自定义成员资格提供程序以验证用户凭据。The following example shows an event handler that passes and values to a custom membership provider to validate the user credentials. 事件处理程序将设置为方法的返回值, 并将设置`true`为, 以使类不验证凭据。The event handler sets to the return value of the method and sets to `true` so that the class does not validate the credentials. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/vb/Global.asax#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户凭据是否已经过身份验证。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user credentials have been authenticated.

value.span: 如果执行了验证用户凭据的所有步骤，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if all the steps for validating the user credentials have been performed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以设置属性来指示类是否必须对用户凭据进行身份验证。You can set the property to indicate whether the class must authenticate the user credentials. 如果为`true`,则该类不通过默认的成员资格提供程序来验证用户凭据。If is `true`, the class does not validate the user credentials through the default membership provider. 相反, 它使用中的值来确定是否创建身份验证 cookie。Instead, it uses the value in to determine whether to create an authentication cookie. 如果为`false`, 则类会通过默认的成员资格提供程序来验证用户凭据, 并覆盖属性中的值。If is `false`, the class validates the user credentials through the default membership provider and overwrites the value in the property. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个事件处理程序 , 它将和值传递到自定义成员资格提供程序以验证用户凭据。The following example shows an event handler that passes and values to a custom membership provider to validate the user credentials. 事件处理程序将设置为方法的返回值, 并将设置`true`为, 以使类不验证凭据。The event handler sets to the return value of the method and sets to `true` so that the class does not validate the credentials. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/vb/Global.asax#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property CustomCredential As String
public: property System::String ^ CustomCredential { System::String ^ get(); };

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取用于身份验证的其他用户值。

span.span: Gets additional user values for authentication.

value.span: 进行身份验证所需的除用户名和密码以外的其他值。

span.span: The values required for authentication other than user name and password.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 事件期间, 你可以使用属性来检索除用户名和密码以外的身份验证值。You can use the property to retrieve authentication values other than user name and password during the event. 例如, 可以将应用程序配置为验证标识号以及用户名和密码。For example, an application might be configured to validate an identification number together with the user name and password. 在这种情况下, 将在`CustomCredential` 方法的参数中传递标识号。In that case, the identification number will be passed in the `CustomCredential` parameter of the method. 然后, 可以通过属性检索自定义值。You can then retrieve the custom value through the property. 属性包含自定义值, 这些值与传递给方法的格式相同。 The property contains the customized values in the same format as they are passed to the method. 在事件处理程序中, 如果属性中存储了多个值, 则必须分析属性的值以检索值。 In the event handler, if more than one value is stored in the property, you must parse the value of the property to retrieve the values. ## Examples 下面的示例演示事件的事件处理程序, 该事件分析属性中的两个身份验证值。The following example shows an event handler for the event that parses two authentication values from the property. 它将两个值以及用户名和密码传递到名为`StudentAuthentication`的自定义身份验证类。It passes the two values and the user name and password to a custom authentication class named `StudentAuthentication`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_MultipleCredentials/vb/Global.asax#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在 事件期间使用属性检索身份验证名称。You use the property to retrieve the authentication name during the event. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个事件处理程序, 该处理程序根据属性的值选择要使用的成员资格提供程序。The following example shows an event handler that selects a membership provider to use based on the value of the property. 处理程序将和值传递到自定义成员资格提供程序以验证用户凭据。The handler passes and values to the custom membership provider to validate the user credentials. 它将设置为方法的返回值, 并将设置`true`为, 以使类不验证凭据。It sets to the return value of the method and sets to `true` so that the class does not validate the credentials. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/cs/Global.asax#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Security.LoginService_NonDefaultProvider/vb/Global.asax#2)]
